alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; Fairfield; McCormick; Newberry; Northern Lancaster; Saluda; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 1:51PM EDT until March 20 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Georgia and central South Carolina. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 5 AM to 9 AM EDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Edgefield; Fairfield; McCormick; Newberry; Northern Lancaster; Saluda; Southern Lancaster
